name: RESET HOOLIGANS
description:
You are an elite time-traveling agent tasked with stopping temporal anomalies. Click objects to target them with your CHRONO DILATOR, then scroll up or down to speed up or slow down the passage of time. Use this power to disrupt infinite loops caused by RESET HOOLIGANS. But beware; any casualties will require a redo!

Game is controlled entirely with the mouse.
LEFT CLICK to select
SCROLL UP OR SCROLL DOWN to change passage of time
RIGHT CLICK to deselect

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47, whose theme was "Stuck in a loop."

vvvvv IF YOU GET STUCK, CLICK THE LINKS BELOW FOR A WALKTHROUGH vvvvv
